info.name: Fast Twitter
info.description: make Twitter fast and compact to see timeline smoothly. - Make effects fast!!! - Make sumbnails on timeline compact. - Show/Hide "What's happening" & "Who to follow". - Make lists header compact. - Optimize on narrow window. ğŸºğŸºğŸº If you like it, you can buy us a beer! ğŸºğŸºğŸº Our userstyles for Twitter works with this completely - Twitter RT Button Outlined - Pastel Color Twitter Setsumei (ja): Twitterã‚’è¦‹ã‚„ã™ãã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«é«˜é€Ÿã§ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒˆã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã€Œã„ã¾ã©ã†ã—ã¦ã‚‹ï¼Ÿ ã€ã€ŒãŠã™ã™ã‚ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ã€ã‚’éè¡¨ç¤ºã«ã—ã¦ã€ãƒ›ãƒãƒ¼ã—ãŸã‚‰è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã§ç”»é¢ã‚’ç‹­ãã—ãŸæ™‚ã«ã‚‚ã„ã‚ã„ã‚ã„ã„æ„Ÿã˜ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ğŸºğŸºğŸº æ°—ã«å…¥ã£ãŸã‚‰ãƒ“ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ãŠã”ã‚‹ã¨ã‚ˆã‚ã“ã³ã¾ã™ ğŸºğŸºğŸº

2022/4/23 mod shrink tall images, fix too much removed padding. rename from "Fast Twitter 2020" to "Fast Twitter" 2020 means 2020 html structure changes of twitter and this userstyle modify it they use that structure 2 years and we do not like the 2020 in the style make you feel it is old.
2022/4/22 mod remove needless white space. fix placeholder text is invisible on dim and dark, fix selected item shrink on search.
